A year ago, the Nobel Peace Price Winner, Dr, Albert Schweitzer,
made a public appeal for a halt in the testing of nuclear weapons.
Throng the Chairman of the Nobel Committee of the Norwegian Par¬
liament, ^Mr. Gunnar lahn. Dr. Schweitzer has asked the Norwegian
Broadcasting Corporation to help him publicize two new appeals,
entitled: ”Peace or Atomic War?”, the former being a warning against
the testing of nuclear weapons, the latter a warning against
nuclear arms in general.
In compliance with Dr, Schweitzer’s wish, I aja pleased to forward
these appeals to you, in the original German. An English trans¬
lation of the first talk is enclosed, and a translation of the
second talk will be forwarded in the course of a few days. With
a view to the broadcasting of the talks, and in agreement with
Dr, Schweitzer; the second of his appeals (’’Verzicht auf
Atomwaffen”) has been divided into two talks.
In the Norwegian version the three talks will have the following
sub-titles.
1. Stop the Testing of Nuclear v'eapons,
2. Renounce Atomic Weapons,
3. The Rapacki Plan and Negociations.
The Norwegian Broadcasting Corporation will broadcast the three
Schweitzer talks in Norwegian on all stations in the shortwave
bands and on medium and long waves at the following times;""
1. Sunday I8. May at 1830 - 185O G.M.T.
2. Monday I9. May at 1830 - I85O ” " ”
3. Tuesday 20, May at I830 - 185O” ” ”
I would like to suggest that any broadcasts or printing of
these talks be headlined at the above times.
